Header.paragraph: BestDrops claims to be the best quality NFT factory of the market.

About.paragraph: The Non-Fungible Token(NFT) represents a unique digital item which can be owned in a block-chain network. NFT market is growing so fast and celebrity tokens and artworks are very popular on the NFT market. Everyday many new collectors enter the market but many artists are waiting to be approved by the big market places. Therefore there is a gap for NFT creators in the market and BestDrops targets to be the center of NFT creation of the market as a self governed NFT community which incentivizes the artists to drop their best works to BestDrops Decentralized Application, by continuously rewarding the artist’s drops by its native governance token. BestDrops is designed to be a DAO which is governed by its community members carrying governance tokens. BestDrops mostly rewards sale of the newly created NFTs but also rewards randomly the unsold items and buyers however takes a service fee for buyers in order to prevent the major problem of the market called wash trades.

data.title: $BESD Token
data.text: BestDrops is introducing its Coin $BESD, a new cryptocurrency ERC-20 token that is used as an incentive to attract the best NFT creators

data.title: DAO
data.text: BestDrops is a Decentralized Autonomous Organization (DAO) which is governed by its community members. Those carrying $BESD coins have a voice on the platform's future

data.title: NFT Contracts
data.text: BestDrops uses its own ERC-721 and ERC-1155 smart contracts on Ethereum Network for NFT creation. Both single edition and multiple editions of NFTs are supported.

data.title: NFT Create UI
data.text: Famous NFT Artists are invited as creators and the platform gives a NFT drop user interface(UI) for these selected creators.

data.title: NFT Auctions
data.text: NFT collectors can buy new NFT drops by auctions or price offers using their Ethereum wallets by our auction and sale offer contracts.

data.title: Earn $BESD
data.text: Users can stake their BDC token and earn more BDC or special artifacts by farming $BESD
